attributes.action: introduce legislation forcing telephone service providers to facilitate the free and easy blocking of withheld and bogus number callers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The TPS service stops law abiding, conscientious companies from phoning us, but the scammers and charlatans still call on an all too frequent basis. I propose that the telephone service providers  are forced to provide a free and easy way for us to decide what calls we receive, allowing us to block withheld, bogus numbers or specific numbers as we and when we choose.
